TextView.android:text:
To measure a point, click the 'Add' button on the top-right corner and select an option the according type regarding if the desired point is on the ground (Based Point) or not (Non-based point). 
To mark a point, click the button-middle button. Remember that if the desired point is not on the ground, you will have to aim first at its 'Base Point' (explained in the previous slide). 
You can cancel a point measurement by clicking on the bottom-left corner button. 
You can finish measuring points and get to the results by clicking on the bottom-right corner button.
